subject: RE: [junit] Failed to invoke suite():java.lang.StackOverflowError
msgSnippet: ... ?!?  you re entirely free to name your variable suite . ... ^^ recursive call ! ... a simple return suite will solve the problem. -Vladimir -- Vladimir
messageBody:
> // TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
> TestSuite sui = new TestSuite(); // fun name and variable must be
> different ..

?!? you're entirely free to name your variable 'suite'.

> public static Test suite(){
> TestSuite suite=new TestSuite();
> suite.addTest(OverviewTest.suite());
>
> return suite();
^^ recursive call !
> }

a simple 'return suite' will solve the problem.

-Vladimir
